PHRASE.LANG: Essential item for those heading into battle. By carrying this item, it displays when you have less than full HP, and refills HP automatically. It is effective even when not equipped. (Permanent effect) [#Legal]

Objet essentiel pour ceux qui se rendent au combat. Si vous portez cet objet, il s'affiche lorsque vos points de santé ne sont plus au maximum et les reconstitue automatiquement. Ces choix sont disponibles même lorsque vous ne portez pas le masque. (Effet permanent) [#Legal]

Wichtiger Gegenstand, wenn man in den Kampf zieht. Trägst du die Kiste bei dir, zeigt sie an, wenn deine GP nicht mehr voll sind und füllt sie automatisch. Wirkt sogar, wenn nicht ausgerüstet. (Permanentwirkung) [#Legal]

Oggetto essenziale per chi si prepara al combattimento. Porta con te questo oggetto, ti segnalerà quando gli HP cominciano a diminuire e li ripristina automaticamente. Attivo anche quando non utilizzato. (Effetto permanente) [#Legal]

Objeto esencial para los combatientes. Al llevar este objeto, muestra cuándo no tienes la salud completa y la rellena automáticamente. No necesitas tenerlo equipado para que tenga efecto. (Efecto permanente). [#Legal]
戦へ向かう者の必需品。\nこのアイテムを所持することでpeakvox ninjaでHPが満タン時以外で表示されるようになり、さらにHPが自動回復するようになります。装備しなくても効果があります。（永久効果）[#Legal]

Essential item for those heading into battle. By carrying this item, it displays when you have less than full HP, and refills HP automatically. It is effective even when not equipped. (Permanent effect) [#Legal]

Essential item for those heading into battle. By carrying this item, it displays when you have less than full HP, and refills HP automatically. It is effective even when not equipped. (Permanent effect) [#Legal]

Essential item for those heading into battle. By carrying this item, it displays when you have less than full HP, and refills HP automatically. It is effective even when not equipped. (Permanent effect) [#Legal]
